We collect this information:
We may use the information to personalize your experience while using the Platform and Websites, to recognize your device to facilitate your use of the Platform and Websites, and to improve the Platform and Websites.
When you access and use the Platform and Websites, we may use technology to automatically collect information to improve our Platform and Websites, and to deliver a better and more personalized service.
We may disclose aggregated information about our Platform users and visitors of our Websites, and information that does not identify any individual or device, without restriction.
The information we collect on or through our Platform and Websites may include: Financial data : bank account information.

We may collect information about your device and internet connection, including the device's unique device identifier, IP address, operating system, browser type, network information, JavaScript support, screen resolution, and screen color processing ability.

We may disclose your personal information for the following reasons: To third parties involved with events that you participate in.

We may disclose your personal information for the following reasons: To a buyer, acquiring entity, or other successor in connection with a merger, combination, divestiture, restructuring, reorganization, dissolution, or other sale or transfer of some or all of Creative MediaWorks's assets, whether as a going concern or as part of bankruptcy, liquidation, or similar proceeding, in which personal information held by Creative MediaWorks about our users is among the assets transferred.

We may disclose your personal information for the following reasons: To our affiliates and service providers we use to support our operations.
We may retain personal information for longer where required by our regulatory obligations or professional indemnity obligations, or where we believe it is necessary to establish, defend or protect our legal rights and interests or those of others.
Where this is the case we will transfer the personal information where we are satisfied that there are comparable levels of protection equivalent to your country of residence by using a legitimate transfer mechanism to the extent required under applicable laws, such as pursuant to standard contractual clauses.
While the purposes for which we may process personal information will vary depending upon the circumstances, in general we use personal information for the purposes set forth below.
